content: Hi, I'm having trouble with my account. I keep getting an error message that says 'invalid report'. Can you help me figure out what's going on?
I apologize for the inconvenience. To better assist you, could you please provide us with your account details and a detailed description of the error message you're receiving?
Okay, my account number is 123456 and I'm seeing this error message on every page: [insert screenshot]

Thank you for providing the information. Based on your description, it seems like there may be an issue with our report generation process. Can you please confirm if you've tried updating your browser or clearing cache?
I've tried both of those things and I'm still getting the error message. Is there anything else I can do to resolve this issue?

I understand your frustration. To further troubleshoot, could you please tell me what specific features or functionality are not working for you? Also, have you noticed any other errors or issues with our service recently?
